_source.text: A few months ago Duffy had an ultrasound to rule out pancreatitis, check the condition of her kidneys and the severity of her heart murmur, all of which were normal/or better than expected but the vet did find some inflammation in her intestines which explained the symptoms Duffy had been showing (sudden onset vomiting, straining to poop, diarreah, bloated doughy feeling abdomin, lethargy, depression) - IBD with previously suspected but now known specific food triggers.
